pullRequest.title: Run Intellij inspections on the common module
pullRequest.bodyText:
Code cleanups include:

Use diamond operator
Remove redundant fields in annotations
Use static inner class when possible for memory
Use method reference for lambdas
Replace string "UTF-8" with StandardCharsets.UTF_8
Remove unecessary variables that store result that we immediately
return
Use Java style array declaration rather than C style

Checklist:

 Have you added a note in the CHANGELOG wiki for your change if user-facing?
 Have you added unit tests for your change?

commit.message:
Run Intellij inspections on the common module

Code cleanups include:

- Use diamond operator
- Remove redundant fields in annotations
- Use static inner class when possible for memory
- Use method reference for lambdas
- Replace string "UTF-8" with StandardCharsets.UTF_8
- Remove unecessary variables that store result that we immediately
  return
- Use Java style array declaration rather than C style

nodes.bodyText: Should configure IDEA to add newline at end of file (Editor > General > Ensure an empty line at the end of the file on Save) or add .editorconfig to do it automatically.
